input.sentences: we went to the marriage equality rally in location last weekend to support uncle [male] and uncle [male] .
one of the first signs we saw that day was one of the best . the energy level was so high | and you could feel the love in the crowd .
one group gave a brief talk about the treatment of homosexuals by the [male] faith . it was extremely touching .
later in the afternoon | we saw another sign reminding us of the loving v. location case .
i nearly cried when talking to [male] and [male] . despite being in a committed relationship for 37 years | they still have n't been able to marry in their home state .
output.sentences: Last weekend my uncle went out to support the gay rights movement.
Most of the people there were holding signs promoting love and a level playing ground but there were others that showed their anger toward the movement.
It was touching to see everyone talk to each other in a way that showed fair treament.
This was my uncles favorite sign reminding people to treat each other in a loving way.
He said it was interesting talking to people about what it means to marry someone in different kinds of relationships.
